Title: Requires camps and youth leagues to have automated external defibrillators
Summary: Requires camps and youth leagues to have automated external defibrillators; requires camps and youth leagues to have at least one person trained to use such defibrillators at camps, games and practices.
LawCode: Add ยง3000-e, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to requiring camps and youth leagues to have automated external defibrillators
